original_text: Jesus then left the meeting place and he went to Simon's home. The mother of Simon's wife was ill and her body was very hot. So they asked Jesus to make her well.
korean_text: 예수께서 일어나 회당에서 나가사 시몬의 집에 들어가시니 시몬의 장모가 중한 열병을 앓고 있는지라 사람들이 그를 위하여 예수께 구하니

sentences.original_text: Jesus then left the meeting place
and he went to Simon's home
The mother of Simon's wife was ill
and her body was very hot
So they asked Jesus to make her well
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 예수님께 그녀를 낫게 해달라고 요청했습니다
